summary: This is a brief email from a US Attorney's Office (likely Southern District of New York) employee to a colleague, alerting them to a forfeiture case involving Jeffrey Epstein. It serves as an internal notification about the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a forfeiture case being brought to a colleague's attention by a US Attorney's Office employee.

events.title: Internal notification about Epstein forfeiture case
events.description: An employee of the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sends an email to a colleague to put a forfeiture case involving Jeffrey Epstein on their radar.

keyFacts: The email is an internal communication within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
It references an active forfeiture case involving Jeffrey Epstein as of April 2019.
The email indicates the forfeiture case was significant enough to warrant bringing it to a senior colleague's attention.
